comments.body: I would separate the try-except-else blocks to improve readability of the tests.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +32,36 @@    # Use an else so that the only reason we skip this is for lack of

    from ansible.plugins.cache.memcached import CacheModule as MemcachedCache

HAVE_REDIS = True
